overview: Collection of six short films from Nova. "Tricking In The Alley" — A deserted alley on a hot summer afternoon is an exciting turn-on for two hot horny and handsome studs looking for sex. "Tricking At The Bar" — It's the bartender's turn to play when the delivery man arrives to refill the beer cases. "Tricking At Home" — Thoughts of going to work are forgotten when a hot young stud pays a house call. "Tricking At The Office" — Hard cocks across the desk meet hungry mouths and the desktop becomes the base for bun-busting fucking and huge loads of creamy cum. "Tricking Off The Street" — Cruising the streets looking for action leads to an encounter between a couple of hot, hard hunks on a deserted stairwell in a warehouse. "Tricking On The Job" — A print shop turns into a sweat shop as two hot-cocked, hard-muscled pressmen break for a session of heavy sex.
title: Tricking
